articles.title: Diljit Dosanjh makes Sia sing in Punjabi for new song Hass Hass, fans shocked - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Diljit Dosanjh and Sia's latest single, Hass Hass is a romantic number with English and Punjabi lyrics. It released on October 26.
articles.content: Diljit Dosanjh is back with his latest track, Hass Hass and this time he collaborated with Australian pop singer Sia. Not only did they deliver a phenomenal song but also sang in Punjabi as well. See… [+2289 chars]

articles.title: 'Ganapath' box office collection Day 7: Tiger, Kriti's film finds no takers - India Today
articles.description: Tiger Shroff and Kriti Sanon's film is hardly minting any money at the box office. It has earned Rs 11 crore till now.
articles.content: Tiger Shroff and Kriti Sanon made their big Bollywood debut together with the 2014 release 'Heropanti'. The duo received praise for their chemistry in the hit film. However, the same can't be said fo… [+1470 chars]
